    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BBQChicken
    The BBQChicken class is a subclass of the Pizza class.
    BuildYourOwn
    The BuildYourOwn class is a subclass of the Pizza class.
    ChicagoPizza
    The ChicagoPizza class is a concrete implementation of the PizzaFactory interface.
    ChicagoPizzaApplication
     
    ChicagoPizzaController
    The `ChicagoPizzaController` manages UI interactions for ordering Chicago-style pizzas in the RuPizzeria app.
    Crust
    The Crust enum represents the different types of crusts available for pizzas.
    Deluxe
    The Deluxe class represents a Deluxe pizza, which is a specific type of pizza with a set pricing structure based on size.
    MainMenuApplication
     
    MainMenuController
    The `MainMenuController` handles navigation between different views in the RuPizzeria app, including New York Pizza, Chicago Pizza, Notepad, and Shopping Cart.
    Meatzza
    The Meatzza class represents a Meatzza pizza, which is a specific type of pizza with a set pricing structure based on size.
    NycPizzaApplication
     
    NycPizzaController
    The `NycPizzaController` handles the UI for ordering New York-style pizzas in the RuPizzeria app.
    NYPizza
    The NYPizza class represents a New York-style pizza factory.
    Order
    The Order class represents a customer's pizza order.
    OrdersPlacedApplication
     
    OrdersPlacedController
    The `OrdersPlacedController` manages the UI for viewing, canceling, and exporting orders in the RuPizzeria app.
    Pizza
    The Pizza class represents a pizza object with a specific crust, size, and toppings.
    PizzaFactory
    The PizzaFactory interface defines methods for creating different types of pizzas.
    ShoppingCartApplication
     
    ShoppingCartController
    The `ShoppingCartController` manages the shopping cart UI in the RuPizzeria app, allowing users to view and modify their current order by adding, removing, or clearing pizzas.
    Size
    Enum representing the available sizes for a pizza.
    Topping
    Enum representing the available pizza toppings.
